mapper.insert: insert contract (createUser,updateUser,createTime, updateTime, postcode,provinceId,provinceName,cityId,cityName, areaId,areaName,remark,isDelete, departmentId,departmentName,userId, userName,companyId,companyName, contractType,contractName, contractStartTime,contractEndTime,totalPrice,contractState,paymentMethod, contractBody,contractNum,customerSigner, signTime,businessType,customerId,customerName ) values ( #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{contractEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{contractState,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{paymentMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contractBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{contractNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{customerSigner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select
from contract where isDelete = 0
and contractName like '%${contractName}%'
and companyId = #{companyId}
and departmentId in (${departmentId})
and userId = #{userId}
order by createTime desc

select
from contract where id=#{id} and isDelete=0
mapper.update: update contract set isDelete=1 where id=#{id} limit 1;
update contract set isDelete=1 where id in (${inId});

update contract set
createUser = #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateUser = #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
postcode = #{postcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
provinceId = #{provinceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
provinceName = #{provinceName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cityId = #{cityId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cityName = #{cityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
areaId = #{areaId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
areaName = #{areaName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isDelete = #{isDelete, jdbcType=INTEGER},
departmentId = #{departmentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
departmentName = #{departmentName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userId = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userName = #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyId = #{companyId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyName = #{companyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contractType = #{contractType, jdbcType=INTEGER},
contractName = #{contractName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contractState = #{contractState, jdbcType=INTEGER},
contractStartTime = #{contractStartTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
contractEndTime = #{contractEndTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
totalPrice = #{totalPrice, jdbcType=DOUBLE},
paymentMethod = #{paymentMethod, jdbcType=INTEGER},
businessType = #{businessType, jdbcType=INTEGER},
contractBody = #{contractBody, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contractNum = #{contractNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customerSigner = #{customerSigner, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signTime = #{signTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
customerId = #{customerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customerName = #{customerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id = #{id} where id = #{id} limit 1
